hero.name: Alexis Toribio.
hero.feature: I build things for the web.
hero.description: I'm a system engineer based in Peru, specializing in building exceptional websites.

about.title: About Me
about.content: Hi, my name is Alexis, I live in Peru. Since I was a child I was passionate about the world of technology and I was always curious about how to create so much wonder, the more I discovered the immense amount of things that could be done, I decided to dedicate myself to web development (frontend and backend) because in this specialty you can let your imagination fly. My goal is to continue growing as a person and professional.
about.alt: A picture of me so you can get to know me.

projects.title: Title 1
projects.description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the text content of a site while looking at its design. Many versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, other times on purpose (for example, inserting humor and the like).

projects.title: Title 2
projects.description: There are many variations of Lorem Ipsum passages available, but most have been altered in some way, either by adding humor, or by random words that don't seem the least bit believable. This generated Lorem Ipsum will always be free of repetitions, added humor or non-language words, etc.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.content: I'm currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
